tier_2_material.accused_details: Harsh @ Tonu Mhaske, Sahil Mhaske, Udesh Chandel, Babu Maniyar, Raju Kerala, Tonu Paikrao, Sattu Rajput, Maruti Ghorpade, Yogesh Bodke, Bhurya

tier_3_contextual.motive: Grudge due to previous chase by the complainant and victim
tier_3_contextual.circumstances_of_killing: The victim was assaulted by a group with weapons following a quarrel

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Akshay Rajendra Parache vs The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.appellant_or_petitioner: Akshay Rajendra Parache, Harsh Kishor Babu

residual_details.additional_facts: The incident involved a gang led by Harsh @ Tonu Mhaske, and MCOC Act provisions were invoked. The accused were allegedly part of a crime syndicate involved in robbery, theft, and extortion.
